# Color Formats ðŸŽ¨

## Named Colors
`red`, `blue`, `forestgreen`

## Hex Codes (Most common)
`#RRGGBB` format.
```css
color: #ff0000; /* Red */
color: #000000; /* Black */
```

## RGB & RGBA
Red, Green, Blue (0-255). Alpha is opacity (0-1).
```css
color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); /* 50% transparent black */
```

## HSL
Hue, Saturation, Lightness.
```css
color: hsl(120, 100%, 50%);
```

slides.title: Backgrounds
Gradients
slides.content:
# Gradients ðŸŒˆ

Smooth transitions between two or more colors.

## Linear Gradient
```css
background: linear-gradient(to right, red, yellow);
```

## Radial Gradient
Start from center.
```css
background: radial-gradient(circle, white, black);
```
